entities.name: harry

entities.name: ron

entities.name: fred

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as Ron's other brother who, like Fred, never gave him a lot of confidence.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as overtaking Hermione and Harry with an eagle on her head. She is described as walking serenely past a group of Slytherins.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone who will be playing, according to Hermione's question.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherins are mentioned as a group of people who are cackling and pointing at Luna Lovegood.
